alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 10:15AM EST until February 18 at 3:55AM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Scott and Hancock Counties. Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Marion, Sequatchie and Bledsoe Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Virginia... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Claiborne and Hancock Counties. Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Union and Claiborne Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Lee and Hancock Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Powell River near Jonesville VA. * WHEN...From this morning to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, The river invades several fields and reaches a few farm buildings. At 20.0 feet, Low lying sections of Routes 641 and 783 are affected and some private driveways are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 815 PM EST /715 PM CST/.
